com.sailthru.mobile.sdk

Class SessionObserver

  • com.sailthru.mobile.sdk.SessionObserver

  • public class SessionObserver

    Moved out to separate class as LifecycleObserver classes are automatically excluded from proguard

    • Field Detail

      • INSTANCE

        public static SessionObserver INSTANCE

        Moved out to separate class as LifecycleObserver classes are automatically excluded from proguard

    • Method Detail

      • onAppForegrounded

        public void onAppForegrounded()

        This tracks application lifecycle onStart events which indicate the app has entered the foreground

      • onAppBackgrounded

        public void onAppBackgrounded()

        This tracks application lifecycle onStop events which indicate the app has entered the background
